name: R4B-HealthcareService-R5-HealthcareService
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B HealthcareService into FHIR R5

element.display: The details of a healthcare service available at a location

target.display: The details of a healthcare service available at a location
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService`

element.display: Whether this HealthcareService record is in active use

target.display: Whether this HealthcareService record is in active use
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.active` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService.active`

element.display: If an appointment is required for access to this service

target.display: If an appointment is required for access to this service
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.appointmentRequired` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService.appointmentRequired`

element.display: Description of availability exceptions
Times the Service Site is available
Always available? e.g. 24 hour service
Closing time of day (ignored if allDay = true)
Opening time of day (ignored if allDay = true)
mon | tue | wed | thu | fri | sat | sun
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Broad category of service being performed or delivered

target.display: Broad category of service being performed or delivered
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService.category`

element.display: Collection of characteristics (attributes)

target.display: Collection of characteristics (attributes)
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.characteristic` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService.characteristic`

element.display: Additional description and/or any specific issues not covered elsewhere

target.display: Additional description and/or any specific issues not covered elsewhere
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.comment` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `HealthcareService.comment` - comment has change due to type change: R4B comment string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 comment

element.display: The language that this service is offered in

target.display: The language that this service is offered in
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.communication` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `HealthcareService.communication` - communication made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService.contained`

element.display: Location(s) service is intended for/available to

target.display: Location(s) service is intended for/available to
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.coverageArea` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService.coverageArea`

element.display: Specific eligibility requirements required to use the service

target.display: Specific eligibility requirements required to use the service
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.eligibility` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility`

element.display: Coded value for the eligibility

target.display: Coded value for the eligibility
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.eligibility.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility.code`

element.display: Describes the eligibility conditions for the service

target.display: Describes the eligibility conditions for the service
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.eligibility.comment` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility.comment`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.eligibility.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.eligibility.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.eligibility.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

target.comment: R4B `HealthcareService.endpoint` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HealthcareService.endpoint`
